definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
It is better to travel hopefully than to arrive.
pinyin: dai4 zhe5 xi1 wang4 qu4 lu:3 xing2 , bi3 dao4 da2 zhong1 dian3 geng4 mei3 hao3
containing_words.word: 带着希望去旅行，比到达终点更美好

definition: Star Trek (US TV and film series)

sentences.english: However, traveling in groups means less freedom.
sentences.chinese: 然而，组团旅行较少自由。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that travelling broadens one’s mind and enlarge/improve/increase one’s knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，旅行使人开阔眼界，增长知识。

sentences.english: Holiday makers travelling in Shanghai must taste raw-fried steam bread.
sentences.chinese: 生煎馒头是游客在上海旅行必尝的食品。

sentences.english: The travellers were dismayed to find the bridge had been wash away.
sentences.chinese: 旅行者们发现桥被冲跑了，很沮丧。

sentences.english: If I have enought money, I will make a journey around the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有足够的资金，我将完成一次环球旅行。

sentences.english: Gathering frequent flyer miles is one of the perks of OCS travel.
sentences.chinese: 积累飞行里程是商务旅行的额外补贴之一。

sentences.english: People who are travelling will always try to make it  to San Francisco because of that diversity.
sentences.chinese: 因为旧金山的多元化，人们会喜欢到这里来旅行。

sentences.english: Generally, travel agencies out there with a travel agency liability insurance.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，跟旅行社出游会有一份旅行社责任险。

sentences.english: Generally, travel agencies out there with a travel agency liability insurance.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，跟旅行社出游会有一份旅行社责任险。

sentences.english: The thirsty wayfarer was glad to find a fresh spring near the road.
sentences.chinese: 口渴的徒步旅行者很高兴在路边找到新鲜的泉水。

sentences.english: Chinese tour operators are notorious for bargaining down travel and hotel costs.
sentences.chinese: 中国旅行团因为在旅行和宾馆花费上砍价而臭名昭著。

sentences.english: Chinese tour operators are notorious for bargaining down travel and hotel costs.
sentences.chinese: 中国旅行团因为在旅行和宾馆花费上砍价而臭名昭著。

sentences.english: Rachel has some great ideas for packing and organizing kids stuff for a trip.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔在关于给孩子旅行装包方面有着很伟大的点子。

sentences.english: When it drizzles in summer, hiking can be pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天下毛毛雨的天气里，徒步旅行甚是惬意。

sentences.english: Let's go to see the castle.
sentences.chinese: 康辉旅行社我们去看看那座城堡吧。

sentences.english: An iodine-based contrast is injected into the bloodstream and watched as it travels around.
sentences.chinese: 注射到血液中碘的对比，看着它旅行左右。

definition: to travel around (the world, a country etc)
to go on a tour/to have an outing
journey/course of a journey/distance traveled/trajectory/itinerary/route/course (of history)/stroke (of a piston)/(Tw) (computing) process
to study away from home or abroad (old)
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
to go on holidays/to spend one's vacation
